full_summary:
### SIAL Digital Transformation - Application Services - Cloud

####noticeType
**Evaluation Procedure:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

####Notice Disclaimer
This procurement notice will close on **2022-11-30T14:00:00**. It was last updated on **2022-11-10**.

####Procurement Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada seeks the services of a qualified bidder to participate in the SIAL Digital Transformation - Application Services - Cloud procurement process.

#### Description

The requirement is for a pool of resources with experience in conceptualization, development, implementation, improvement, and deployment of MS Dynamics 365 Online and Power Platform in a cloud environment. The bidder will directly provide services to clients while maintaining oversight and ensuring alignment with the architectural models set out by the Department.

####Key Requirements

- **Scope of Work**: Provide the services outlined in this RFP.
- **Duration**: The contract period will be for an estimated twelve (12) months from the date of contract, with two (2) option periods of 12 months each.
- **Delivery Date**: Estimated delivery date is **2024-01-31**.
- **Level of Effort**: Two thousand (2000) days for the initial period for a minimum of nine (9) resource(s).
- **Contract Value**: The contract value is estimated to be three million, four hundred twenty-five thousand, seven hundred six dollars and ninety cents ($3,425,706.90), including taxes.

####Eligibility Criteria

- **Trade Agreements**: This requirement is open to bidders under various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA).
- **Tiers of Service**: Bidders must have a Tier 1 qualification for services in the National Capital Region in the categories of Application/Software Architect L3 and Programmer Analyst L3.

####Pre-Qualified Bidders

A list of pre-qualified bidders, including Akkada professional Services and Zernam Enterprise in JV, Bulletproof Solutions ULCCM Inc., and others, has been posted on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

####Contact Information

For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact Betty Woodman at `Betty.Woodman@international.gc.ca` or by phone at `343-203-6922`.

####Reference Documents

The RFP document is available for download from the [Buyandsell.gc
